comments:
Consumers of TPTP have reported that if you open a test suite using a UNC path and then attempt to execute that test suite programatically, the test execution will fail.  See the stack trace below:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: invalid relative pathName: file:\foo-mobile\temp\Simple\simple\SimpleTest.testsuite
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI.createFileURI(URI.java:801)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.JavaExecutionDeploymentAdapter.getSourceRootDir(JavaExecutionDeploymentAdapter.java:696)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.JavaExecutionDeploymentAdapter.getDeployFilePath(JavaExecutionDeploymentAdapter.java:587)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.JavaExecutionDeploymentAdapter.collectDeployableArtifacts(JavaExecutionDeploymentAdapter.java:329)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.JavaExecutionDeploymentAdapter.collectDeployableFiles(JavaExecutionDeploymentAdapter.java:240)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.JavaExecutionDeploymentAdapter.deployTestAssets(JavaExecutionDeploymentAdapter.java:468)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.util.ExecutionAdapterUtilities.adaptExecutionDeployment(ExecutionAdapterUtilities.java:159)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.TestExecutionHarness.launchTestExecution(TestExecutionHarness.java:1988)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.TestExecutionHarness.access$2(TestExecutionHarness.java:1856)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.TestExecutionHarness$2.run(TestExecutionHarness.java:692)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: invalid relative pathName: file:\cdavis-mobile\temp\Simple\simple\SimpleTest.testsuite
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI.createFileURI(URI.java:801)
Some fixes have been made for this, but additional work may need to be done.  Deferring to 4.2.1.
Fixes from 4.2 appear to be complete.  Please re-open if additional problems are found.
